text: @SpeakerPelosi SEN Kennedy tried to get billions of dollars in matured savings bonds into hands of owners in time of need. It was denied & was told it is unrelated to the Covid-19 bill.  Somehow a study on Sunscreen & funding a liberal arts center is related to the bill?  God will punish you!

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
